column4: I found the command I was looking for to see the raw dump of Wacom inputs.  navigate to /dev/input and use sudo xxd 'eventX' x being whatever number your tablet is on
didn't help. I checked the version and it's 2.18.1, I just don't have the sidebars.
that would remove all your configureations for nautilus....
hmm not sure that would affect it... what is happening about your sidebar?  I'm confused as to what is wrong
no, but that's where I do get the graphic.
hey man try hittin f9, that opens the sidebar
what about your view menu?  is sidebar checked?
I don't have a sidebar in my view menu.
yes. both the about menu and nautilus --version say so
compiz, but it still happens with metacity
I'm at a loss man.  sorry.  try making a post?  Get rid of nautilus?
wish my fps in DF was better in wine... Strike the Earth!
my fps went up to 28 with xfce instead of gnome-desktop
